document_data.name: The Imperious Flame
document_data.mainbody: '''The Imperious Flame''' was a temple in [[Calimport]] dedicated to the worship of the god [[Kossuth]].
document_data.Location: The Imperious Flame was located in [[Masal Drudach]], part of the [[Bakkal Sabban]] of the [[Calimport/Faiths Ward|Faiths Ward]], in Calimport.
document_data.Structure: This building stood five stories tall.
